MODULE_PAYMENT_WEBMONEY_TEXT_DESCRIPTION:
Our data in WebMoney system:

Our WM ID:    %s
Our R purse number:    %s
Our Z purse number:    %s

To pay for the order you need to transfer money to our R or Z purse in WebMoney system, and in the note indicate the number of your order

Your order number will be sent to your Email address

The transfer must be WITHOUT protection of the transaction

How to make a transfer:
To make a transfer, open WM Keeper and right click on the purse from which you want to transfer, and then select from the Transfer Money - To WebMoney wallet menu. In the dialog that appears, enter the transfer amount and the number of our purse, and in the note specify your order number
